elements.name: party
elements.title: Generally speaking, do you usually think of yourself as a Republican, a Democrat, an Independent, or what?

elements.name: partyOther
elements.title: Which political party do you identify with?

elements.name: republicanStrength
elements.title: Would you call yourself a strong Republican or a not very strong Republican

elements.name: democratStrength
elements.title: Would you call yourself a strong Democrat or a not very strong Democrat

elements.name: independentLean
elements.title: Do you think of yourself as closer to the Republican Party or the Democratic Party?

elements.name: republicanImportance
elements.title: How important is being a Republican to you?
elements.description: Below is a range from 0 to 100 indicating how important this is to you. Click on any space within this range and a bar will appear. Feel free to move that bar around to the number that best represents your answer.

elements.name: democratImportance
elements.title: How important is being a Democrat to you?
elements.description: Below is a range from 0 to 100 indicating how important this is to you. Click on any space within this range and a bar will appear. Feel free to move that bar around to the number that best represents your answer.

elements.name: independentImportance
elements.title: How important is being an Independent to you?
elements.description: Below is a range from 0 to 100 indicating how important this is to you. Click on any space within this range and a bar will appear. Feel free to move that bar around to the number that best represents your answer.

elements.name: otherImportance
elements.title: How important is being a member of your political party to you?
elements.description: Below is a range from 0 to 100 indicating how important this is to you. Click on any space within this range and a bar will appear. Feel free to move that bar around to the number that best represents your answer.
